scenario_text.value:
What about these nuts? Think they’re safe for
us to eat?

*sniff* *sniff*... Yep, these are fine.
They taste pretty good!

Oh yeah? Then we should take back some more
of this stuff.

Maybe eating some tasty food might raise
everyone’s spirits.

(Shuuji and Lopmon are working hard for
everyone’s sake.)

(I wish there were something I could do,
too.)

(Shuuji and Lopmon sure do get along. The two
of them should be just fine.)
